Pre-Game Insights: A new-look Indian T20 team will embark on a journey of self-discovery without their constant talismans, Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli, hoping to unearth their mainstays for the future in a five-match series against Zimbabwe starting in Harare on July 6, 2024.
Shubman Gill, who was a reserve in the T20 World Cup squad, will hit a refresh button along with a bunch of IPL performers during the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is scheduled to be played entirely in the Zimbabwean capital, Harare.
Zimbabwe, led by Sikandar Raza, could prove to be a handful on nippy afternoons at the Harare Sports Club.
